resources.string: Please Check Your email for instructions on resetting your password
Email Address Not Found. Kindly Register
Make sure you can remember your password, as you\'ll need it to sign back in

Geass Technology Pvt Ltd ("the Company") respects and values users privacy. Your privacy is very important to us. This Privacy Policy ("Privacy Policy") explains how the Company collects, uses, discloses and protects user thats personally identifiable information and non-personally identifiable information. This Privacy Policy also explains when you receive communications from the Company or other persons on behalf of the Company. This Privacy Policy applies to all who use or access the website www.twentyfourcrafts.com (and affiliate websites) and the mobile application (app) collectively and individually referred to herein as the "24Crafts" (the "24Crafts"). 


 This Privacy Policy is an integral part of the Terms and Conditions. You are requested and advised to read this Privacy Policy in conjunction with the Terms and Conditions. 


 By using 24Crafts you acknowledge and agree that the company may, in its sole discretion, preserve or disclose your Content, as well as your information, such as email addresses, IP addresses, timestamps, and other user information, if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such preservation or disclosure is reasonably necessary to: comply with legal process; enforce these Terms; respond to claims that any Content violates the rights of third-parties; respond to claims that contact information (for example phone number, street address) of a third-party has been posted or transmitted without their consent or as a form of harassment; protect the rights, property, or personal safety of the company its users or the general public. 


 DATA WE COLLECT 


 Information posted on 24Crafts is obviously publicly available. Our servers are located in Mumbai, India. Therefore, if you choose to provide us with personal information, you are consenting to the transfer and storage of that information on our servers 


 The Company collects and store two types of information about you: 
 Personally identifiable information; and 
 Non-personally identifiable information 


 PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION 
 This includes information such as your name, address, photos, videos, mobile number, date of birth, gender, e-mail address, location, etc. 


 Personal skills, experience related information. 


 Certain actions on your part like creating your profile or posting your requirement will result in the creation and storing of such personally identifiable information. 


 NON-PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION 
 This includes information such as geo-location of a browser or device that is used to access the Website/app, 
 computer sign-on data, statistics on page views, traffic to and from 24Crafts and Ad data (all through cookies that you can take steps to disable the cookies on your browser although this is likely to affect your ability to use the site) 
 IP address of your server from where the Website/app is being accessed and standard web log information 
 URLs visited prior to the Website, or URLs visited after visits to the Website, device types, browser types, or device specific identifiers such as the operating system used by you, your Internet service provider (ISP), referring/exit pages, platform type, date/time stamp, and number of clicks 
 IMEI number 
 All the content/information regarding the profiles and requirements are stored in our database, even after deletion 


 WE COLLECT DATA FOR 


 provide our services 
 resolve disputes, collect fees, and troubleshoot problems 
 improve our products and services 
 customize users' experience, measure interest in our services, and inform users about services and updates 
 provide you with personalized email/notifications about new products, special offers or other information which we think you may find interesting 
 From time to time, we may also use your information to contact you for market research purposes. We may contact you by email, phone, fax or mail. We may use the information to customize the app according to your interests. 
 encourage safe use and enforce our policies 
 Do other things for users as described when we collect the information 


 AUTHORITY TO DISABLE THE ACCOUNT 


 It is made clear that only the company shall have the exclusive authority to disable your account, either in event of violation of the terms on your part, or as per your reasonable request. 
 Please note that even after your account is disabled some Search engines will still show your page in their index. 


 SECURITY 


 The information and contents provided and uploaded by the user on 24Crafts shall be sent by us to the other users, partners and service providers, who shall have all the rights to access such information and contents 
 The Company may share your non-personally identifiable information with various third parties, including affiliates, advertisers, vendors, partners and services providers 


 LINKS TO OTHER APPS 
 Our app may contain links to other apps of interest. However, once you have used these links to leave our site, you should note that we do not have any control over that other app. 
 Therefore, we cannot be responsible for the protection and privacy of any information which you provide whilst visiting such sites and such sites are not governed by this privacy statement. 
 You should exercise caution and look at the privacy statement applicable to the app in question. 


 CONTROLLING YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION 
 You may choose to restrict the collection or use of your personal information in the following ways: 
 Whenever you are asked to fill in a form on the app, look for the box that you can click to indicate that you do not want the information to be used by anybody for direct marketing purposes. 
 We will not sell, distribute or lease your personal information to third parties unless we have your permission or are required by law to do so. We may use your personal information to send you promotional information about third parties which we think you may find interesting if you tell us that you wish this to happen. 
 If you believe that any information we are holding on you is incorrect or incomplete, please email us as soon as possible, at the address feedback@www.twentyfourcrafts.com We will promptly correct any information found to be incorrect. 


 ACCESSIBILITY AND AVAILABILITY OF THE CONTENT AND INFORMATION FOR THE REGISTERED USERS 
 We collect information in relation to the registered users, therefore only registered users of our app shall have rights to access information and 24Crafts may not have any control over how users use the information. 
 When you add an application, your content and information is shared with the application. We require applications to respect your privacy settings, but your agreement with that application will control how the application can use the content and information you share. 


 When you delete content, it is deleted in a manner similar to emptying the recycle bin on a computer. However, you understand that removed content may persist in backup copies for a reasonable period of time (but will not be available to others). 


 24Crafts may change, suspend or discontinue any or all of the Services or any Content for any reason, at any time, including the availability of any feature or part of the Content at its sole discretion on notice to you where same relates to Premium Services. 24Crafts may also impose limits on all or any of the Services or restrict your access to parts or all of the Services without notice or liability. 


 USE OF THE SERVICES BY YOU 
 The users can access only their own account and profiles, after being registered with us in order to access the information that is posted to the app. All Users agree that any registration information you give to us will always be accurate, correct and up to date. 


 You agree to use the Platform only for purposes that are permitted by (a) the Terms and Conditions of Use and (b) any applicable law, regulation or generally accepted practices or guidelines in the relevant jurisdictions (including any laws regarding the export of data or software to and from the India). 


 Login details that we will store the User's access details so that when a registered User logs in and accesses the Platform we may offer the User the option to sync their contacts from a third party. We will ask the User to consent to having their contacts synced and the user can opt out of giving third parties their consent. 


 24Crafts reserves the right to remove, edit, move or close any account for any reason and to suspend or ban any User account for any reason. 


 You understand that all information (such as data files, written text, computer software, music, audio files or other sounds, photographs, videos or other images) which you may have access to as part of, or through your use of, the Services are the sole responsibility of the person from which such content originated. All such information is referred to above as the "Content". 


 You should be aware that Content presented to you as part of the search facility, including but not limited to User Profiles, advertisements in the Services and sponsored Content within the Services may be protected by intellectual property rights which are owned by the sponsors or advertisers who provide that Content (or by other persons or companies on their behalf). You may not modify, rent, lease, loan, sell, distribute or create derivative works based on this Content (either in whole or in part) unless you have been specifically told that you may do so by 24Crafts or by the owners of that Content, in a separate agreement. 


 You understand that by using the Platform you may be exposed to Content that you may find offensive, indecent or objectionable and that, in this respect, you use the Platform at your own risk. 


 You agree that you are solely responsible for (and that we has no responsibility to you or to any third party for) any Content that you create, transmit or display while using the Platform and for the consequences of your actions (including any loss or damage which we may suffer) by doing so. 


 OTHER PEOPLE'S RIGHTS 
 We respect other people's rights, and expect you to do the same. 
 You will not post content or take any action on the Platform that infringes or violates someone else's rights or otherwise violates the law. 


 You agree that nothing in the Terms and Conditions of Use gives you a right to use any of 24Crafts trade names, trademarks, service marks, logos, domain names, and other distinctive brand features. 


 SALE OF BUSINESS 
 We reserve the right to transfer information (including your personal information) to a third party in the event of a sale, merger, liquidation, receivership or transfer of all or substantially all of the assets of our company. 


 SECURITY 
 Your personal information is held on secure servers hosted by our Internet Service Provider. Unfortunately, no data transmission over the Internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. As a result, while we will take all reasonable steps to protect your personal information, the nature of the Internet is such that we cannot and do not guarantee or warrant the security of any information you transmit to us via the Internet. 


 DISCLAIMER AS TO ACCURACY OF INFORMATION 
 Care has been taken in the preparation of the information contained on this App. However, we do not make any representations or warranties as to the accuracy of the information contained on this App.

Introduction 


 Welcome to www.twentyfourcrafts.com (and affiliate websites) and the 24crafts mobile application (app) collectively and individually referred to herein as the "24crafts" (the "24crafts"). These are the terms and conditions governing your use of the 24crafts ("herein after referred to as Acceptable Use Policy "AUP"). By accessing 24crafts either through the website or any other electronic device, you acknowledge, accept and agree to the following terms of the AUP, which are designed to make sure that 24crafts works for everyone. This AUP is effective from the time you log in to 24crafts. By accepting this AUP, you are also accepting and agreeing to be bound by the Privacy Policy and the Listing Policy. 


 Definitions 


 By "24crafts" we mean the platform, platform features, services, applications and search facilities we make available, including through 
 (a) the app and any other branded or co-branded apps (including mobile applications, sub-domains, international versions, widgets, applications and mobile versions); 
 (b) our Platform; and 
 (c) other media, software, devices, or networks now existing or later developed.By "Us," "We" and "Our" we mean 24crafts.By "Platform" we mean Platform and a set of APIs and services that enable applications, developers, operators or services, to retrieve data or provide data to us.By "Information" we mean facts and other information about you, including any information you supply to e.g. telephone number and also any actions you take.By "Content" we mean anything you post including any location information that would not be included in the definition of "information. 


 By "Data" we mean content and information that third parties can retrieve or provide. 
 By "Post" we mean post on our app or otherwise make available to us. 
 By "Use" we mean use, access, view, download, upload, copy, publicly perform or display, distribute, modify, translate, and create derivative works of. 
 By "Users" we mean a User(s) who is/are registered with the us. 
 By "Application" we mean any application or app that uses or accesses the 24crafts. Platform, as well as anything else that receives data. 
 By "Services" we mean searching for User Profiles on the 24crafts Platform and advertising updates and services. 
 "Premium Services" may include, but not be limited to, the job post creation, notification of jobs created on the platform, formation, designing, storage, management, sharing and linking of media and/or document files (including, but not limited to text, user comments, messages, information, data, graphics, photographs, images, illustrations, animations, software, audio and video, also collectively known as the "Content"). 


 In addition Premium Services may include the purchase of additional In-App currencies for promotional activities. Please note that part of the Services (or special features) may be provided only to Users who subscribe for such Services and 24crafts may charge fees for such Services. The Services are provided as is and assumes no responsibility for any failure in providing the Services to the Users. 


 Using 24crafts 


 You agree and understand that 24crafts is an internet enabled electronic platform that connects artists with talent seekers, which shall be availed to anyone, who visits on the site for the purpose of seeking talents or opportunity, for which you have no objection. 


 You further agree and understand that we do not endorse, market or promote any of the listings, postings or information, you have posted, listed or provided information about on our site. 


 While interacting with other users on our site, with respect to any listing, posting or information we strongly encourage you to exercise reasonable diligence as you would in traditional off line channels and practice judgment and common sense before exchange of information. 


 You shall use 24crafts as a platform on compliance of all the rules and regulations, therefore 24crafts shall not be held liable or responsible for any consequences in event of any money transaction with any party, directly done by you. 


 While making use of 24crafts and other services such as the discussion forums, comments and feedback and other services interalia, you will post in the appropriate category or area and you agree that your use of the Site shall be strictly governed by this AUP including the policy for listing of your Classified which shall not violate the prohibited and restricted items policy (herein after referred to as the (Listing Policy.) 


 "Your Information" is defined as any information you provide to us or other users of the Site during the registration, posting, creating content or replying process, in the feedback area (if any), through the discussion forums or in the course of using any other feature of the Services. 


 You agree that you are the lawful owner having all rights, title and interest in your information, and further agree that you are solely responsible and accountable for Your Information and that we act as a mere platform for your online distribution and publication of Your Information.You agree that your listing, posting and / or Information :Shall not be fraudulent, misrepresent, mislead or pertain to the someone elseShall not infringe any intellectual property, trade secret, or other proprietary right or rights of publicity or privacy of any third party.Shall not consist of material that is an expression of bigotry, racism or hatred based on age, gender, race, religion, caste, class, lifestyle preference, and nationality and / or is in the nature of being derogatory, slanderous to any third party.Shall not be obscene, contain pornography or contain â€œindecent representation of womenâ€ within the meaning of the Indecent Representation of Women (Prohibition) Act, 1986.Shall not distribute or contain spam, multiple / chain letters, or pyramid schemes in any of its forms. 


 Shall not distribute viruses or any other technologies that may harm 24crafts or the interests or property of 24crafts users or impose an unreasonable load on the infrastructure or interfere with the proper working of 24crafts.Shall not list or post or pertain to information that is either prohibited or restricted under the laws of the Republic of India and such listing, posting or information shall not violate 24crafts thats Listing Policy.You consent to receive communications by email, call or by such other mode of communication, electronic or otherwise related to the services provided through the 24crafts. 


 
 Accounts and Fees 


 A user is required to become a registered member and create account on the 24crafts before availing the services offered by 24crafts, for posting/accessing content. 24crafts reserves its rights to modify any system for verifying and identifying the users. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your User ID, password, email address and for restricting access to your computer, computer system, computer network and your 24crafts account, and you are responsible for all activities that occur under your User ID and password. If you access the Site using any electronic device other than by registration on the Site, the AUP remains applicable to you in the same manner as if you are a registered user on the Site. If you become a registered user of 24crafts, you agree to be responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the passwords. You agree to notify 24crafts in the event of any unauthorized use of your password or any loss of your password. 


 24crafts expressly reserves the rights to change or modify its services given under premium services. 24crafts reserves the right to change or modify its prices and fees at any time, and such changes or modifications shall be posted online at the App and effective immediately without need for further notice to any user. 24crafts have the right to adjust prices by territory in order to allow for various taxes or other changes. Any charges or modifications in prices and fees shall be effective when the Services in question are up for renewal. 


 If you elect to sign up for Paid services (for in-app uses), you shall pay all applicable fees, as described on the App in connection with such Premium Services selected by you. You agree to pay the applicable fees for the Premium Services (including, without limitation, periodic fees for upgrade accounts) as they become due plus all related taxes, and to reimburse us for all collection costs. Your obligation to pay fees continues until you cancel your subscription. If you elect to sign up for Premium Services, you authorize us directly or through third parties, to make any inquiries it considers necessary to validate your account and financial information that you provided while signing up for such Services. 


 You are fully aware that the charges or fees paid/to be paid by you to 24crafts for availing any of the premium services through physical or the digital way, is non-refundable, therefore you hereby irrevocably state, confirm and declare that in any event you shall not claim the refund of any such charges, paid by you to 24crafts. You confirm that 24crafts shall not be responsible to compensate you in case if I do not get any opportunity to work in the film, TV Serial, modelling, advertisement, print shoot, photo session, commercial advertising and all other kind of works, as displayed on 24crafts. 


 
 Abuse of 24crafts 


 You agree to inform us if you come across any listing or posting that is offensive or violates our listing policy or infringes any intellectual property rights by clicking on the following link support@twentyfourcrafts.com to enable us to keep the site working efficiently and in a safe manner. We reserve the right to take down any posting, listing or information and or limit or terminate our services and further take all reasonable technical and legal steps to prevent the misuse of the Site in keeping with the letter and spirit of this AUP and the listing policy. In the event you encounter any problems with the use of our site or services you are requested to report the problem by clicking on this link support@twentyfourcrafts.com 


 Violation by User 


 You agree that in the event your listing, posting or your information violates any provision of this AUP or the listing policy, we shall have the right to terminate and or suspend your membership of the Site and refuse to provide you or any person acting on your behalf, access to the Site. 


 Content 


 The Site contains content which includes Your Information, 24crafts's information and information from other users. You agree not to copy, modify, or distribute such content (other than Your Information), 24crafts's copyrights or trademarks. When you give us any content as part of Your Information, you are granting us a non-exclusive, worldwide, perpetual, irrevocable, royalty-free, sub-licensable right and license to use, reproduce, , publish, translate, distribute, perform and display such content (in whole or part) worldwide through the Site as well as on any of our affiliates or partners websites, publications and mobile platform. We need these rights with respect to the content in Your Information in order to host and display your content. If you believe that there is a violation, please notify us by clicking here support@twentyfourcrafts.com. 


 Liability 


 You agree not to hold 24crafts or any of its officers, employees, agents responsible or accountable for any of your listing, postings or information and nor shall we, our officers, employees or agents be liable for any misuse, illegal activity or third party content as most postings, listings or information are generated by various users directly and we do not have any role in the creation, publication or distribution of the posting, listing or information, nor are we in a position to have editorial control over the substance or content contained in the listings, postings, or information, save and except to the extent provided in section above. 


 You understand and agree that we do not guarantee the accuracy or legitimacy of any listing, posting, and information by other users. You further agree that we are not liable for any loss of money, goodwill, or reputation, or any special, indirect, or consequential damages arising out of your use of the site or as a result of any sale, purchase of goods and services with other users of the site. We also cannot guarantee continuous or secure access to our Services. Accordingly, to the extent legally permitted we exclude all implied warranties, of merchantability, fitness or quality of the Site and our services. 


 You understand and agree that 24crafts is not under obligation of any contract, and you further agree and acknowledge that 24crafts shall not be made a party to any dispute, litigation, proceeding, prosecution etc., You confirm that 24crafts shall not be liable to pay any compensation, fine, dues, penalty or any other charges to anyone or association or any other authority in connection with any dispute or litigation between yourself and any other party. You are solely responsible for your interactions with other members. You are aware that all the decisions taken by you shall be your exclusive and sole decision and 24crafts shall not be concerned, nor shall be held liable or responsible for the same. In event of the traveling to any destination to any party, availed by you through 24crafts, if you undergo through any ditches, misappropriation, harm, injury, cheating, physical assault, outraging the modesty, 24crafts shall not be concerned, nor shall be held liable or responsible. 


 Personal Information 


 By using 24crafts, you agree to the collection, transfer, storage and use of any personal information provided by you on the Site by TalentAce Private Limited. The data is stored and controlled on servers located in Mumbai, India as further described in our Privacy Policy. By submitting your personal details/resume with your replies, you give permission to 24crafts to publicly display your personal details/resume which can be freely accessed by anyone. You also agree to receive marketing communications from us unless you specifically indicate otherwise in writing to us through support@twentyfourcrafts.com 


 You hereby authorize 24crafts to display your photographs, snaps, working shoot and other contents (auditions etc.,) given by you to 24crafts and the same can be accessed by anyone, who use 24crafts. You allow 24crafts to use the contents of your audition or any part thereof for advertisement without paying any charges for that. 


 
 General 


 We may update this AUP or the listing policy or the privacy policy at any time and may notify you of such updates via a post on the boards and /or through email communications. The modified AUP and /or Listing/Privacy Policy shall come into effect either at the time you place your next posting, listing or information on the Site or after a period of 30 days from the date of the update, whichever is sooner. If we or our corporate affiliates are involved in a merger or acquisition, we may share personal information with another company, but this AUP shall continue to apply. 


 Directory Usage 


 As and when using the in-app directory, you shall not penalize or blame 24Crafts for any wrong information present within the Directory. 24Crafts does not hold ownership of the directory nor does it claim any ownership of the content mentioned within the Directory. The Directory is merely referenced off other Internet websites and Apps (likened to JustDial and Sulekha) and 24Crafts provides a coalition of multiple sources of information in a single application for ease of access and nothing more. You agree not to plaigarise the content of the directory not do you bear any rights to accuse 24Crafts of incorrect information. FOr further queries, please visit JustDial.com or Sulekha.com for their references. Please note that all Directory Pages have been affixed with a "Footer" referencing the Source of each information. 24Crafts does in NO WAY claim rights or stake to the information provided nor do we HOST any of the information within our servers. 


 Third Party content and Services 


 24crafts may provide, on its site, links to sites operated by other entities. If the user decides to view this site, they shall do so at their own risk, subject to that site thats terms and conditions of use and privacy policy that may be different from those of this site. It is the user thats responsibility to take all protective measures to guard against viruses or other destructive elements they may encounter on these sites. 24crafts makes no warranty or representation regarding, and do not endorse any linked website or the information appearing thereon or any of the products or services described thereon. 


 Indemnity 


 The User should agree to indemnify and hold 24crafts, its officers, subsidiaries, affiliates, successors, assigns, directors, officers, agents, service providers, suppliers and employees, harmless from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorney fees and court costs, made by any third party due to or arising out of content submitted by the user, users use of the service, violation of the TOU, breach by the user of any of the representations and warranties herein, or user thats violation of any rights of another. 


 Governing Law and Jurisdiction 


 This AUP and the Listing Policy shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of India and the courts at Mumbai shall have exclusive jurisdiction on all matters and disputes arising out of and relating to the Site.

"Material is the metaphor.

"
"A material metaphor is the unifying theory of a rationalized space and a system of motion." "The material is grounded in tactile reality, inspired by the study of paper and ink, yet " "technologically advanced and open to imagination and magic.
" "Surfaces and edges of the material provide visual cues that are grounded in reality. The " "use of familiar tactile attributes helps users quickly understand affordances. Yet the " "flexibility of the material creates new affordances that supercede those in the physical " "world, without breaking the rules of physics.
" "The fundamentals of light, surface, and movement are key to conveying how objects move, " "interact, and exist in space and in relation to each other. Realistic lighting shows " "seams, divides space, and indicates moving parts.

"
"Bold, graphic, intentional.

"
"The foundational elements of print based design typography, grids, space, scale, color, " "and use of imagery guide visual treatments. These elements do far more than please the " "eye. They create hierarchy, meaning, and focus. Deliberate color choices, edge to edge " "imagery, large scale typography, and intentional white space create a bold and graphic " "interface that immerse the user in the experience.
" "An emphasis on user actions makes core functionality immediately apparent and provides " "waypoints for the user.

"
"Motion provides meaning.

"
"Motion respects and reinforces the user as the prime mover. Primary user actions are " "inflection points that initiate motion, transforming the whole design.
" "All action takes place in a single environment. Objects are presented to the user without " "breaking the continuity of experience even as they transform and reorganize.
" "Motion is meaningful and appropriate, serving to focus attention and maintain continuity. " "Feedback is subtle yet clear. Transitions are efﬁcient yet coherent.

"
"3D world.

"
"The material environment is a 3D space, which means all objects have x, y, and z " "dimensions. The z-axis is perpendicularly aligned to the plane of the display, with the " "positive z-axis extending towards the viewer. Every sheet of material occupies a single " "position along the z-axis and has a standard 1dp thickness.
" "On the web, the z-axis is used for layering and not for perspective. The 3D world is " "emulated by manipulating the y-axis.

"
"Light and shadow.

"
"Within the material environment, virtual lights illuminate the scene. Key lights create " "directional shadows, while ambient light creates soft shadows from all angles.
" "Shadows in the material environment are cast by these two light sources. In Android " "development, shadows occur when light sources are blocked by sheets of material at " "various positions along the z-axis. On the web, shadows are depicted by manipulating the " "y-axis only. The following example shows the card with a height of 6dp.

"
"Resting elevation.

"
"All material objects, regardless of size, have a resting elevation, or default elevation " "that does not change. If an object changes elevation, it should return to its resting " "elevation as soon as possible.

"
"Component elevations.

"
"The resting elevation for a component type is consistent across apps (e.g., FAB elevation " "does not vary from 6dp in one app to 16dp in another app).
" "Components may have different resting elevations across platforms, depending on the depth " "of the environment (e.g., TV has a greater depth than mobile or desktop).

"
"Responsive elevation and dynamic elevation offsets.

"
"Some component types have responsive elevation, meaning they change elevation in response " "to user input (e.g., normal, focused, and pressed) or system events. These elevation " "changes are consistently implemented using dynamic elevation offsets.
" "Dynamic elevation offsets are the goal elevation that a component moves towards, relative " "to the component’s resting state. They ensure that elevation changes are consistent " "across actions and component types. For example, all components that lift on press have " "the same elevation change relative to their resting elevation.
" "Once the input event is completed or cancelled, the component will return to its resting " "elevation.

"
"Avoiding elevation interference.

"
"Components with responsive elevations may encounter other components as they move between " "their resting elevations and dynamic elevation offsets. Because material cannot pass " "through other material, components avoid interfering with one another any number of ways, " "whether on a per component basis or using the entire app layout.
" "On a component level, components can move or be removed before they cause interference. " "For example, a floating action button (FAB) can disappear or move off screen before a " "user picks up a card, or it can move if a snackbar appears.
" "On the layout level, design your app layout to minimize opportunities for interference. " "For example, position the FAB to one side of stream of a cards so the FAB won’t interfere " "when a user tries to pick up one of cards.

"
